title: Concurrent Execution of Multiple Strategies
description: Verify the system supports simultaneous execution of multiple independent trading strategies without performance degradation or interference.

steps.description: Configure and start the trading engine with multiple different trading strategies enabled.
Ensure all strategies execute trades independently and concurrently without errors.
Monitor system resource usage to confirm no performance degradation during concurrent execution.
Verify that all position management is maintained correctly per strategy without crossover.

title: Seamless Switching Between Paper Trading and Real Trading Modes
description: Ensure users can switch between paper trading and real trading modes without data loss or operational errors.

steps.description: Start the trading engine in paper trading mode and run a strategy.
Confirm trades are simulated and no real orders are sent to broker.
Switch the trading engine to real trading mode during live execution.
Verify that live orders are sent correctly to the broker with no data loss.
Switch back to paper trading mode.
Confirm continued correct operation and data integrity on mode toggle.

title: Live Price Data Updates via WebSocket Integration
description: Test that the system receives and caches live price data accurately and timely from Kotak Neo API V2 using WebSocket.

steps.description: Connect trading engine to Kotak Neo API V2 WebSocket feed.
Verify that live price data is continuously received without interruptions.
Confirm that received data is cached properly and accessible to strategies.
Simulate network delay and verify latency monitoring reflects accurate timings.

title: AI Market Regime Detection Accuracy
description: Validate AI Brain's ability to detect market regimes (Trending vs Sideways) correctly based on live and historical data.

steps.description: Feed historical market data with known regimes into the AI Brain module.
Verify the AI Brain correctly classifies the market regime.
Provide live data simulating switching between trending and sideways markets.
Ensure AI Brain dynamically updates regime detection in real-time accordingly.

title: AI Trade Signal Validation and Risk Assessment
description: Assess AI Brain's effectiveness in validating trade signals and dynamically assessing risk to reduce false positives.

steps.description: Generate a set of trade signals with known valid and invalid cases.
Confirm AI Brain accepts valid trade signals and suppresses invalid ones.
Evaluate AI risk assessment adjustments in response to varying market conditions.
Verify that risk levels adapt dynamically and signals are filtered accordingly.

title: Real-Time Dashboard Updates with Live PnL and Thinking Logs
description: Check that the frontend dashboard updates live PnL figures and AI thinking logs correctly and in real-time without crashes.

steps.description: Execute strategies generating trade activity over a period.
Observe dashboard PnL updates reflect latest trade results without latency.
Verify AI thinking logs update continuously in the UI as decisions occur.
Trigger deliberate frontend errors to test error boundaries.
Ensure error boundary prevents UI crashes and displays appropriate messages.

title: Strategy Management UI Toggle Functionality
description: Test the one-click toggling feature to enable or pause strategies from the UI and its immediate effect on the trading engine.

steps.description: Navigate to the strategy management UI.
Click toggle button to pause an active strategy.
Confirm strategy halts execution immediately in the trading engine.
Click toggle button again to enable the paused strategy.
Verify strategy resumes execution without errors.

title: Heatmap Visualization for Win/Loss Distributions
description: Validate that heatmaps correctly visualize win and loss distributions over different times and price ranges in the dashboard.

steps.description: Run strategies to generate trade results with varying outcomes across different time periods and price ranges.
Check heatmap displays correct aggregation of wins and losses corresponding to trade data.
Verify heatmap updates dynamically as new trade data arrives.

title: Automated AI-Generated Daily and Weekly PDF Reports
description: Ensure the system generates accurate and detailed PDF reports summarizing performance and strategy health daily and weekly.

steps.description: Simulate execution data and trigger daily and weekly report generation.
Verify reports generate on schedule containing accurate trade summaries and analytics.
Inspect reports for correct inclusion of AI-generated insights on strategy health and risk.

title: Error Handling and Connection Status Indicators
description: Test robustness of system error handling and verify connection status indicators reflect actual system connectivity states.

steps.description: Simulate API disconnection or failures in broker integration and AI services.
Check that the error handling system captures and logs errors gracefully without crashing.
Verify the connection status indicators on the frontend reflect disconnected state promptly.
Restore connections and verify indicators update to connected status.

title: Telegram Trade Alert Notifications
description: Validate that the system sends real-time trade alerts via Telegram in response to trade execution events.

steps.description: Execute trades using the trading engine.
Verify that trade alert messages are delivered promptly to the configured Telegram account.
Confirm alert contents accurately reflect trade details (instrument, quantity, price, time).

title: Comprehensive Logging and Latency Monitoring
description: Check that system logs all API interactions and monitors latency metrics effectively to demonstrate stable system health and broker connectivity.

steps.description: Perform a series of API calls to Kotak Neo and AI Brain services during live trading.
Inspect logs for accurate, timestamped records of requests and responses.
Verify latency metrics are recorded and updated in the monitoring dashboards.
Introduce network latency and confirm monitoring reflects the increased response times.

title: Strategy Creation and Selection via Backend
description: Validate that users can create new strategies and select existing strategies through the backend/server API successfully.

steps.description: Send API requests to create new trading strategies on the backend.
Verify strategies are created with correct parameters and persisted in database.
Request list of existing strategies.
Confirm all created strategies are listed and selectable for execution.

title: Frontend Dashboard Auto Connection on Server Start
description: Ensure the frontend dashboard automatically connects and displays real-time data and AI thinking logs once the backend server and trading engine are started.

steps.description: Start backend server and initiate trading engine.
Open frontend dashboard and verify it connects automatically without needing manual input.
Check real-time market data, PnL, and AI thinking logs are displayed on dashboard.

title: Accuracy of Frontend Analytics Metrics Computation
description: Verify that frontend computes performance analytics metrics (CAGR, Max Drawdown, Win Rate, Equity Curves) accurately based on real trading and paper trading data.

steps.description: Run strategies generating three sets of controlled trade results with defined PnL profiles.
Verify each analytics metric is calculated correctly and matches expected manual calculations.
Confirm updates occur in real-time as new trade results arrive.
